games.name: Super Mario All-Stars (SNES)

games.name: Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike - Fight for the Future
challenge: (FightCade) Both contestants select 3 fighters and submit these ahead of the match to the referee.
You can keep using each character until you lose a fight with them.
First one to run out of characters, loses.

games.name: Streets of Rage 2 (MD)
games.challenge: Fastest time to complete Stage 1, Hardest, One Life. If both players fail to finish, the player that got the furthest wins.
